name: Ceux Qui Restent
description:
Ceux Qui Restent

Ceux Qui Restent is our end-of-year project at ENJMIN.
It is a game on Microsoft HoloLens focused on revealing the memories of a room.

The memory room has broken for a reason that you, the memory technician, will be in charge to discover. Link back the corrupted memories together to find the truth.
